purpose: The email announces the call for papers and workshop proposals for the 23rd IEEE International Conference on Software Architecture (ICSA 2026), which will be held in Amsterdam from June 22-26, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit papers for various tracks, including the Research Track and the Software Architecture in Practice Track, with specific deadlines for submissions. Additionally, it encourages proposals for workshops that focus on emerging trends in software architecture.
evidence_sentences: We are excited to announce several opportunities for contributing to the 23rd IEEE International Conference on Software Architecture (ICSA 2026), the premier conference for software architecture.
The conference will take place in Amsterdam, Netherlands, from June 22-26, 2026.
We invite researchers to submit papers for the Research Track at ICSA 2026.
This year's theme is Architecting in Continuous Software Engineering: Evolving Roles, Enduring Principles.
We are also inviting software architecture practitioners and researchers working with practitioners to submit papers for the Software Architecture in Practice Track.
We are also accepting workshop proposals for ICSA 2026!
